body.name: LIFERECORD 6 inch Full Mattress in a Box, Gel Memory Foam Mattresses Made in USA for Full Bed, Medium Firm, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 34 mins
features: 【The Perfect Balance of Support and Pressure Relief】Full mattress with infused gel green tea AeroFusion memory foam makes your breath fresher and you feel cooler, and the flex support base foam provides the essential spinal support you need.

【Health and Hypoallergenic】Full size mattress features a graphene technology outer cover and a fiberglass-free flame-retardant inner cover, ensuring they won't irritate your skin or affect your health. CertiPUR-US and OEKO-TEX, guarantee your health.

【Comfortable Medium Firm】Medium firmness is designed for every kind of sleeper and conforms to every curve, whether you're a side sleeper, back sleeper, stomach sleeper, or someone who tosses and turns.

【Mattress in a Box, Fit all Frames】Our full bed mattress is compressed and packaged in a box for shipping, making it easy to ship it to your doorstep. They fit all frames such as bunk beds, floors, slatted bases, platforms, and adjustable beds.

【10-year Limited Warranty】Memory foam full mattress is proudly made in the USA and backed by our 10-year limited warranty. If you are unsatisfied for any reason, please contact us at any time for support through your order.

【Warm Tips】6 inch mattress is specially designed for small-weight individuals and may feel firmer for heavier individuals. Please allow up to 48 hours after opening the mattress for the foam to adjust to its final feel once it settles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just now took it out of the plastic and it is on my daybed. It has inflated quite a bit in just an hour . 8 hours later it is at 8 inches, slept on it, very, very good nights sleep. I got medium-firm and it is perfect. I had a medium before this and it was too soft. But I had a thoracic-posterior spinal fusion, my entire thoracic, lumbar & both lower back discs were removed and are now made of metal. I have been a back sleeper ever since, so I didn’t want to go firm, case it felt like a board but this medium firm is just right. It’s soft on the body yet is holds your body up, you feel the support. Like sleeping on a cloud knowing that you’re not going to fall through it. I hope it stands the test of time. It was definitely worth the price. I was going to give it 4 stars because it’s not made in USA nor is the country of origin in USA like the ad states but I gave it 5 because I’m grading the mattress and it deserves 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy, great quality
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is very comfortable. I used to sell mattresses. This one is too quality, highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It definitively has a smell
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my 9 year old daughter and I left it out to air for 2days so that it can expand… I didn’t really notice the smell initially but I bought a tent to go over the mattress so that she gets less draft while she’s sleeping(her room is located at the corner of house and tends to be colder than other rooms). When I opened her tent to wake her up this morning, I was hit with the strong chemical smell! I left the tent opened, hopefully it will dissipate… because albeit the smell, the mattress is good, just firm enough for comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable mattress and great night's sleep
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased a memory foam topper from this same brand when my Mom was coming to visit. She has back pain and I was a bit worried, but it was really comfortable and she loved it. So, when it came time to order a new mattress for our condo, I decided to give this one a try. I am so glad that I did. It arrived nicely packed in vacuum sealed plastic and in a box. This was great because it was easy to transport to the condo, but also is good just to get it into the room of your choice easily. The mattress opened up to its full size fairly quickly, but we allowed a full 48 hours prior to using it. It had no noticeable odor and came clean and in good condition. The mattress itself is soft, but not so much that it is uncomfortable. It feels very supportive and is conducive to a great night's sleep. When I get up from it, the memory foam quickly regains its original shape and does not leave my indent. This is a very comfortable mattress and great value for the money. It fit on my bed perfectly, and I would certainly buy another memory foam mattress from this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding mattress for Value
reviews.reviewText: *** update*** 1 year later and my daughter still has the most comfortable mattress in the house and her Dad and I own a $1500 mattress and this has ours beat. Lol still a great buy a year later! Holding up beautifully!Bought for my daughter. Carefully chose this one after much research and couldn't be happier. She now has the best mattress of all of us lol. And once our king goes out I am 100% buying this for my husband and I. Its extremely comfortable and has held up well. 4 months of use, we let inflate for 2 days before using and was perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not really a medium firm mattress.
reviews.reviewText: I would consider his to be a firm mattress and not medium firm. Therforr, expect a firm feel if ordered. The quality appears to be fine for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This mattress stinks
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is good quality and comfortable. I was very excited about it at first but, after a few weeks it started to stink! I used baby power on it. It just got worse, so I tried Phoof. Nothing helped. It absorbs moisture from your body and starts to stink like dirty feet! After 9 months of it we had to get rid of the mattress. It's like new but can't be used because of the awful oder. I would never buy this product again.
